title: Schema Validation Test
description: As a developer, I want to validate the JSON schema implementation so that I can ensure data integrity.
iWant: to validate the JSON schema implementation
acceptanceCriteria: Given a valid JSON payload, when submitted to the API, then it should be accepted
Given an invalid JSON payload, when submitted to the API, then it should be rejected with validation errors
Given missing required fields, when submitted to the API, then it should return specific field errors
